frontmatter.name: Taylor Fairbank
frontmatter.title: Javascript Performance in Extreme Conditions: Building WebApps for the Refugee Aid Movement
frontmatter.bio: I like building ethical technology and operational planning, which is what I'm lucky enough to do every day at Distribute Aid. I studied computer science at the University of Illinois, and have previously founded a startup which was accepted into Y Combinator.  When I’m not coding or organizing, I enjoy hiking and learning to cook new vegetarian dishes.
